attributes.comment:
Please reconsider raising these fees. As someone who has completed one
international adoption and is working on my second I can attest to the huge
expenses associated with international adoptions both financially and emotionally.
So many families of middle income are struggling to come up with all the stated
and unstated fees from our agencies, the international country as well as current
US Government expenses that a rise in these fees is going to put the dream of a
family out of reach for so many.

There has to be a better way to obtain your needs than to take more and more
from those already doing so much.

Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lisa Castner
